name: The Software House
tag_list: software-development, hosting-platform, technological-partner, development, it-development, php, ruby, ruby-on-rails, php-development, ruby-development, www, e-commerce, ecommerce
description: Software development company based in PL
overview:
We’re software development house based in Poland. We have 15 experienced developers skilled mainly in PHP i Ruby.

Our clients are located in Poland, Netherlands, Italy, Germany and USA (New York and Chicago), so we have worked out an efficient remote cooperation model.

Our main competences are focused on dedicated software development in area of:

  • hosting platforms/ cloud solutions,
  • staff services,
  • accounting platforms,
  • dedicated e-commerce solutions.

We are enthusiasts of scrum methodology, since we believe that’s the most effective way of an IT project development.

Please contact us if you are looking for trusted and professional technological partner for your project.
